/usr/bin/g++ -pthread -lstdc++fs -std=c++17 -O3 -DNDEBUG CMakeFiles/clusterer.dir/src/main.cu.o CMakeFiles/clusterer.dir/cmake_device_link.o -o bin/clusterer   -L/usr/local/cuda-12.6/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-12.6/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  /usr/local/cuda-12.6/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudart_static.a libclusterer_static.a /usr/local/cuda-12.6/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudart_static.a -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.a -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
